QuestData.Title: *Gurgle* HELP! *Gurgle*
QuestData.Description: *GURGLE*$B$BHELP!*GASP*$B$BORKUS IS DROWNING! HELP ME, QUEST GIVER $n!$B$B*GLUB*$B$BDwarf threw Orkus into the water! Must not die!$B$B*GURGLE*$B$BThe shame would be too great.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Orkus Safely Escorted Out of the Water
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Kingslayer Orkus get out of the water.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Kingslayer Orkus at the Ruins of Southshore in Hillsbrad Foothills.
QuestData.RewardText: <Orkus' face turns as red as his armor.>$B$BI... uh... the human must have cast some type of mind-altering spell on Orkus. Orkus will explain.
